price: 98. Sungguh, kamu (orang kafir) dan apa yang kamu sembah selain Allah, adalah bahan bakar Jahannam. Kamu (pasti) masuk ke dalamnya.
arabic: إِنَّكُمۡ وَمَا تَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ حَصَبُ جَهَنَّمَ أَنتُمۡ لَهَا وَٰرِدُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innakum wamā taʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi ḥaṣabu jahannama antum lahā wāridūna
